verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> which came unto Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Cushi<WH3570>, the son<WH1121> of Gedaliah<WH1436>, the son<WH1121> of Amariah<WH568>, the son<WH1121> of Hezekiah<WH2396>, in the days<WH3117> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Amon<WH526>, king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>.
I will utterly<WH622> consume<WH5486> all things from off the face of the ground<WH6440>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

I will consume<WH5486> man<WH120> and beast<WH929>; I will consume<WH5486> the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>, and the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220>, and the stumblingblocks<WH4384> with the wicked<WH7563>; and I will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> from off<WH6440> the face of the ground<WH127>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And I will stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> upon Judah<WH3063>, and upon all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>; and I will cut off<WH3772> the remnant<WH7605> of Baal<WH1168> from this place<WH4725>, and the name<WH8034> of the Chemarim<WH3649> with the priests<WH3548>;
and them that worship<WH7812> the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> upon the housetops<WH1406>; and them that worship<WH7812>, that swear<WH7650> to Jehovah<WH3068> and swear<WH7650> by Malcam<WH4428>;
and them that are turned back<WH5472> from<WH310> following Jehovah<WH3068>; and those that have not sought<WH1245> Jehovah<WH3068>, nor inquired after him<WH1875>.

Hold thy peace<WH2013> at the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3068>; for the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068> is at hand<WH7138>: for Jehovah<WH3068> hath prepared<WH3559> a sacrifice<WH2077>, he hath consecrated<WH6942> his guests<WH7121>.

And it shall come to pass in the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s sacrifice<WH2077>, that I will punish<WH6485> the princes<WH8269>, and the king<WH4428>'s sons<WH1121>, and all such as are clothed<WH3847> with foreign<WH5237> apparel<WH4403>.
And in that day<WH3117> I will punish<WH6485> all those that leap<WH1801> over the threshold<WH4670>, that fill<WH4390> their master<WH113>'s house<WH1004> with violence<WH2555> and deceit<WH4820>.

And in that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, there shall be the noise<WH6963> of a cry<WH6818> from the fish<WH1709> gate<WH8179>, and a wailing<WH3215> from the second<WH4932> quarter<WH1419>, and a great crashing<WH7667> from the hills<WH1389>.
Wail <WH3213>, ye inhabitants<WH3427> of Maktesh<WH4389>; for all the people<WH5971> of Canaan<WH3667> are undone<WH1820>; all they that were laden<WH5187> with silver<WH3701> are cut off<WH3772>.

And it shall come to pass at that time<WH6256>, that I will search<WH2664> Jerusalem<WH3389> with lamps<WH5216>; and I will punish<WH6485> the men<WH582> that are settled<WH7087> on their lees<WH8105>, that say<WH559> in their heart<WH3824>, Jehovah<WH3068> will not do good<WH3190>, neither will he do evil<WH7489>.

And their wealth<WH2428> shall become a spoil<WH4933>, and their houses<WH1004> a desolation<WH8077>: yea<WH1129>, they shall build houses<WH1004>, but shall not inhabit<WH3427> them<WH5193>; and they shall plant vineyards<WH3754>, but shall not drink<WH8354> the wine thereof<WH3196>.

The great<WH1419> day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068> is near<WH7138>, it is near<WH7138> and hasteth<WH4118> greatly<WH3966>, even the voice<WH6963> of the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068>; the mighty man<WH1368> crieth<WH6873> there bitterly<WH4751>.

That day<WH3117> is a day<WH3117> of wrath<WH5678>, a day<WH3117> of trouble<WH6869> and distress<WH4691>, a day<WH3117> of wasteness<WH7722> and desolation<WH4875>, a day<WH3117> of darkness<WH2822> and gloominess<WH653>, a day<WH3117> of clouds<WH6051> and thick darkness<WH6205>,
a day<WH3117> of the trumpet<WH7782> and alarm<WH8643>, against the fortified<WH1219> cities<WH5892>, and against the high<WH1364> battlements<WH6438>.

And I will bring distress<WH6887> upon men<WH120>, that they shall walk<WH1980> like blind men<WH5787>, because they have sinned<WH2398> against Jehovah<WH3068>; and their blood<WH1818> shall be poured out<WH8210> as dust<WH6083>, and their flesh<WH3894> as dung<WH1561>.

Neither their silver<WH3701> nor their gold<WH2091> shall be able<WH3201> to deliver<WH5337> them in the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s wrath<WH5678>; but the whole land<WH776> shall be devoured<WH398> by the fire<WH784> of his jealousy<WH7068>: for he will make<WH6213> an end<WH926>, yea, a terrible end<WH3617>, of all them that dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776>.
